lines:
March 23 LEO

1936 22, 19

to do nekatledge en raita v a ar 14th inst 
enclosing check for $80,01 phish I have deposited to your goals tesout You 
need offer na spologies for your delay, I have been put to ne inconvenience

hatever

I ai par tátularly interested to learn that you wey visit andover in the 
mer future. We shall be delighted to welcome you to Andover. As you doubtlens 
E , te enjoyed a visit from tår, Tang Kaisen last talle Bo stată several days in

Anaver, and every one thoroughly enjoyed him

Kind person Leerde

eliers de

Very sinoerely yours
raw: March 23 LEO 1936 22, 19 to do nekatledge en raita v a ar 14th inst enclosing check for $80,01 phish I have deposited to your goals tesout You need offer na spologies for your delay, I have been put to ne inconvenience hatever I ai par tátularly interested to learn that you wey visit andover in the mer future. We shall be delighted to welcome you to Andover. As you doubtlens E , te enjoyed a visit from tår, Tang Kaisen last talle Bo stată several days in Anaver, and every one thoroughly enjoyed him Kind person Leerde eliers de Very sinoerely yours

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter acknowledged receipt of the $600 check to be applied to his son's account. Stearns is delighted that Dr. Kwan will be visiting Andover and recalls that he enjoyed the visit of Mr. Tong Kaison last fall.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
